ComicInfo.Title: All in a Day's Work!; Strange But True-ly Cracked!; One Day at Bennie's Burrito Hut; Superhero Shut-Ups; How Things Really Began - Not!; Celebrity Dogs; You Know You've Been Listening to Too Much Howard Stern, When...; Freezing People Can Be a Good Thing!; Epochs in History; Cartoons of the Year; Cracked Cliques!; Believe It or Nuts!!; Replacement TV Shows We'd Like to See.; Legends of the Stud!; Rapper in the Crapper; Superhero Trading Cards You'll Never See!; Non-Violent Super Heroes!; No Pussyfootin' Around Here!; The Great White Dope!; Dork Angel
